short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an Google Chrome extension that will change the appearance of Growtopia Forums website layout to dark theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark theme for Growtopia Forums, this extension will change the appearance of Growtopia Forums to dark layout.
